t: Frequently Asked Questions: Amazon Drive Deprecation
s: A: Amazon Photos customers have 90 days to restore files that have been moved to the Trash. Directions on how to restore your files can be found here. Any folders or files deleted from Amazon Drive prior to December 31, 2023 will be deleted and won't be accessible from Amazon Photos.

t: Amazon Drive apps
s: Amazon Drive lets you free up space on your phone, tablet, and computer, by backing up all of your documents to one secure place. Sign in to Amazon Drive on the web, or through the free iOS and Android apps, and save, share, organize, and store all of your stuff.

t: Amazon Drive is shutting down at the end of 2023 | The Verge
s: July 29, 2022 - Amazon Drive, the company’s cloud storage offering, is shutting down on December 31st, 2023. But you’ll still be able to keep your images and videos on Amazon Photos.

t: Amazon Drive - Wikipedia
s: April 27, 2025 - Amazon Drive, formerly known as Amazon Cloud Drive, was a cloud storage application managed by Amazon.
